VoiceCanvas
AI PoweredVoice Cloning50+ Languages

Instant text-to-speech in 50+ languages with voice cloning, powered by advanced AI for natural and clear voice synthesis.

Core Features

High-Quality Voice

Crystal-clear voice synthesis with natural intonation and rhythm

Multiple Languages

50+ languages with both male and female voices, perfect for global content

Advanced Features

Customize speed, visualize audio, and enable word-by-word reading for better learning

Voice Cloning

Personalized voice cloning for more human-like AI speech

How Voice Cloning Works

1

Upload Voice

Upload a 3-10 second clear voice sample

2

AI Analysis

AI extracts voice features and builds model

3

Clone Ready

Generate personalized AI voice model

4

Enter Text

Input text you want to convert

5

Apply Model

Use the cloned AI voice model

6

Generate Speech

Output natural cloned voice speech
